search_results.snippet:
A gaffer in the motion picture industry and on a television crew is the head 
electrician, responsible for the execution (and sometimes the design) of the 
lighting plan for a production. The term gaffer originally related to the moving of 
overhead equipment to control lighting levels using a gaff. The gaffer's assistant 
is the best boy. ... The term has been used for the chief electrician in films since 
the 1930s.
